archimate:Requirement.name: BA.1.1.5e: e) prevent information about the internal workings of applications (e.g. in application responses, error messages, or developers' comments (particularly in HTML and JavaScript-based applications)) from being disclosed
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
